chapter.title: Network Map
chapter.para: The Network Map shows the items through which the subscriber is connected to the network, and the status of each item as detected by the optical QoS test. Each item's status is noted by a green check mark (okay) or red X (faulty). When an item is faulty, more information about the fault can be found in the Detected Issues and Recommendations table.

As with any Customer Service Console application, the Network Map is updated when the NetworkMapData test module runs, which happens when it is called by the startup test group when a session is created.
A variety of configurations can appear; for example, the subscriber's line could be connected through from 0 to 3 splitters. The figures below show some typical Network Map configurations.
